credit_line: Gift of Mrs. William A. Hutcheson
title: Handkerchiefs
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plate printed on plain weave
description: The printing plate contained the design for four children's handkerchiefs which were never cut into individual handkerchiefs. The fabric was hemmed, embroidered with initials and used as a man's handkerchief.
name: Handkerchiefs
